content.query:
--Drop VIEW scorecard.vwPostSecondary;


CREATE VIEW scorecard.vwPostSecondary AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    a.[Cohort Year],
    a.[School Code],
    a.[School Name],
    b.[District Code],
    b.[District Name],
    a.[Student Group Type],
    a.[Student Group Category],
    a.[Student Group],
    a.[PS Enroll Level],
    a.[Pct] AS [Pct School],
    a.[Redacted Pct],
    a.[Cohort Type],
    b.[Pct] AS [Pct District]
FROM
    [transform].[PostSecondarySchool] a
    INNER JOIN [transform].[PostSecondaryDistrict] b
        ON a.[District Code] = b.[District Code]
        AND a.[Cohort Year] = b.[Cohort Year]
        AND a.[Student Group] = b.[Student Group]
        AND a.[PS Enroll Level] = b.[PS Enroll Level]
        AND a.[Cohort Type] = b.[Cohort Type]
        AND a.[Redacted Pct] = b.[Redacted Pct]
        AND a.[District Name] = b.[District Name];
